fields.title: Family
fields.description: Words related to family members and relationships

fields.title: Food & Drink
fields.description: Vocabulary about daily meals, fruits, and beverages

fields.title: Travel
fields.description: Common words used when traveling and at the airport

fields.title: Technology
fields.description: Vocabulary about computers, internet and gadgets

fields.title: Education
fields.description: Words related to school, subjects and university life

fields.title: Work & Career
fields.description: Vocabulary about jobs, office and professional life

fields.definition: A person related to you who lived a long time ago
fields.example_sentence: My ancestors came from Italy.
fields.meaning_sentence: Tổ tiên của tôi đến từ Ý.

fields.definition: A brother or sister
fields.example_sentence: I have three siblings.
fields.meaning_sentence: Tôi có ba anh chị em.

fields.definition: A member of your family
fields.example_sentence: All her relatives came to the wedding.
fields.meaning_sentence: Tất cả họ hàng của cô ấy đã đến dự đám cưới.

fields.definition: A husband or wife
fields.example_sentence: Involve your spouse in the decision.
fields.meaning_sentence: Hãy để bạn đời của bạn tham gia vào quyết định.

fields.definition: The son of your brother or sister
fields.example_sentence: I am taking my nephew to the zoo.
fields.meaning_sentence: Tôi đang đưa cháu trai đi vườn bách thú.

fields.definition: The daughter of your brother or sister
fields.example_sentence: My niece is very good at drawing.
fields.meaning_sentence: Cháu gái tôi vẽ rất giỏi.

fields.definition: The man who has married your mother but is not your father
fields.example_sentence: He has a good relationship with his stepfather.
fields.meaning_sentence: Anh ấy có mối quan hệ tốt với cha dượng.

fields.definition: To legally take another person's child into your own family
fields.example_sentence: They decided to adopt a child.
fields.meaning_sentence: Họ quyết định nhận nuôi một đứa trẻ.

fields.definition: All the people of about the same age within a society
fields.example_sentence: The younger generation is very tech-savvy.
fields.meaning_sentence: Thế hệ trẻ rất am hiểu công nghệ.

fields.definition: To receive money, property, or a title from someone when they die
fields.example_sentence: She inherited a fortune from her grandmother.
fields.meaning_sentence: Cô ấy thừa kế một gia tài từ bà mình.

fields.definition: A drink of any type
fields.example_sentence: Hot beverages include tea and coffee.
fields.meaning_sentence: Đồ uống nóng bao gồm trà và cà phê.

fields.definition: Containing many of the substances that your body needs
fields.example_sentence: Raw vegetables are more nutritious than cooked ones.
fields.meaning_sentence: Rau sống bổ dưỡng hơn rau đã nấu chín.

fields.definition: One of the foods that are used together to make a particular dish
fields.example_sentence: Mix all the ingredients together.
fields.meaning_sentence: Trộn tất cả các nguyên liệu lại với nhau.

fields.definition: A style of cooking
fields.example_sentence: I love Italian cuisine.
fields.meaning_sentence: Tôi yêu ẩm thực Ý.

fields.definition: A small amount of food eaten before a meal
fields.example_sentence: We had some olives as an appetizer.
fields.meaning_sentence: Chúng tôi ăn một ít ô liu làm món khai vị.

fields.definition: Sweet food eaten at the end of a meal
fields.example_sentence: What’s for dessert?
fields.meaning_sentence: Món tráng miệng có gì vậy?

fields.definition: Having a very pleasant taste or smell
fields.example_sentence: The food was delicious.
fields.meaning_sentence: Đồ ăn rất ngon.

fields.definition: A set of instructions telling you how to cook something
fields.example_sentence: Do you have a good recipe for cake?
fields.meaning_sentence: Bạn có công thức làm bánh nào ngon không?

fields.definition: A person who does not eat meat for health or religious reasons
fields.example_sentence: Is he a vegetarian?
fields.meaning_sentence: Anh ấy có phải là người ăn chay không?

fields.definition: Containing strong flavours from spices
fields.example_sentence: I don't like spicy food.
fields.meaning_sentence: Tôi không thích đồ ăn cay.

fields.definition: The place where someone is going
fields.example_sentence: Spain is a popular holiday destination.
fields.meaning_sentence: Tây Ban Nha là một điểm đến du lịch phổ biến.

fields.definition: A detailed plan or route of a journey
fields.example_sentence: The tour operator will provide an itinerary.
fields.meaning_sentence: Công ty lữ hành sẽ cung cấp một lịch trình.

fields.definition: A place to live, work, or stay in
fields.example_sentence: The hotel provides luxury accommodation.
fields.meaning_sentence: Khách sạn cung cấp chỗ ở sang trọng.

fields.definition: An official document used for traveling to other countries
fields.example_sentence: Don't forget your passport!
fields.meaning_sentence: Đừng quên hộ chiếu của bạn!

fields.definition: The act of leaving a place
fields.example_sentence: The departure time is 8 AM.
fields.meaning_sentence: Giờ khởi hành là 8 giờ sáng.

fields.definition: The act of coming to a place
fields.example_sentence: We apologize for the late arrival of the train.
fields.meaning_sentence: Chúng tôi xin lỗi vì đoàn tàu đến muộn.

fields.definition: Something you buy to help you remember a holiday
fields.example_sentence: I bought this t-shirt as a souvenir.
fields.meaning_sentence: Tôi đã mua chiếc áo phông này làm kỷ niệm.

fields.definition: The activity of visiting interesting places
fields.example_sentence: We did some sightseeing in Paris.
fields.meaning_sentence: Chúng tôi đã đi tham quan một vài nơi ở Paris.

fields.definition: Bags and cases that you carry with you when you are traveling
fields.example_sentence: You can check your baggage here.
fields.meaning_sentence: Bạn có thể gửi hành lý tại đây.

fields.definition: A journey in an aircraft
fields.example_sentence: How was your flight?
fields.meaning_sentence: Chuyến bay của bạn thế nào?

fields.definition: Programs used by a computer
fields.example_sentence: He writes software for mobile phones.
fields.meaning_sentence: Anh ấy viết phần mềm cho điện thoại di động.

fields.definition: The physical parts of a computer system
fields.example_sentence: The computer hardware needs an upgrade.
fields.meaning_sentence: Phần cứng máy tính cần được nâng cấp.

fields.definition: A set of rules to be followed in calculations
fields.example_sentence: The social media algorithm is complex.
fields.meaning_sentence: Thuật toán mạng xã hội rất phức tạp.

fields.definition: A large amount of information stored in a computer system
fields.example_sentence: We need to update our customer database.
fields.meaning_sentence: Chúng ta cần cập nhật cơ sở dữ liệu khách hàng.

fields.definition: A system of connected computers
fields.example_sentence: The company network is down.
fields.meaning_sentence: Mạng của công ty đang bị hỏng.

fields.definition: Protection of devices and data
fields.example_sentence: Internet security is very important.
fields.meaning_sentence: An ninh mạng rất quan trọng.

fields.definition: Made by people, often as a copy of something natural
fields.example_sentence: Artificial intelligence is growing fast.
fields.meaning_sentence: Trí tuệ nhân tạo đang phát triển nhanh chóng.

fields.definition: The state of being joined or linked
fields.example_sentence: I have a poor internet connection.
fields.meaning_sentence: Tôi có kết nối internet kém.

fields.definition: An object or machine that has been invented for a particular purpose
fields.example_sentence: This is a very useful device.
fields.meaning_sentence: Đây là một thiết bị rất hữu ích.

fields.definition: A computer program designed for a particular purpose
fields.example_sentence: I downloaded a new application.
fields.meaning_sentence: Tôi đã tải xuống một ứng dụng mới.

fields.definition: The subjects studied in a school or college
fields.example_sentence: The school is changing its curriculum.
fields.meaning_sentence: Trường học đang thay đổi chương trình giảng dạy.

fields.definition: An amount of money given by a school to pay for the studies
fields.example_sentence: She won a scholarship to Harvard.
fields.meaning_sentence: Cô ấy đã giành được học bổng vào đại học Harvard.

fields.definition: A piece of work given to someone as part of their studies
fields.example_sentence: I have a lot of assignments this week.
fields.meaning_sentence: Tôi có rất nhiều bài tập trong tuần này.

fields.definition: A person who has a first degree from a university
fields.example_sentence: He is a graduate of Oxford University.
fields.meaning_sentence: Anh ấy là người tốt nghiệp đại học Oxford.

fields.definition: A formal talk on a serious subject given to a group of people
fields.example_sentence: I have a history lecture at 10 AM.
fields.meaning_sentence: Tôi có một bài giảng lịch sử lúc 10 giờ sáng.

fields.definition: The money paid for being taught
fields.example_sentence: Tuition fees are rising.
fields.meaning_sentence: Học phí đang tăng lên.

fields.definition: The buildings and surrounding land of a university
fields.example_sentence: The university has a beautiful campus.
fields.meaning_sentence: Trường đại học có khuôn viên rất đẹp.

fields.definition: A formal test of a person's knowledge
fields.example_sentence: I need to study for my final exam.
fields.meaning_sentence: Tôi cần học cho kỳ thi cuối kỳ.

fields.definition: A building containing collections of books
fields.example_sentence: I spend most of my time in the library.
fields.meaning_sentence: Tôi dành phần lớn thời gian trong thư viện.

fields.definition: Understanding of or information about a subject
fields.example_sentence: Knowledge is power.
fields.meaning_sentence: Kiến thức là sức mạnh.

fields.definition: A fixed amount of money agreed every year as pay for an employee
fields.example_sentence: She has a high salary.
fields.meaning_sentence: Cô ấy có mức lương cao.

fields.definition: The act of raising someone to a higher or more important position
fields.example_sentence: He is hoping for a promotion.
fields.meaning_sentence: Anh ấy đang hy vọng được thăng chức.

fields.definition: A meeting in which someone is asked questions to see if they are suitable for a job
fields.example_sentence: I have a job interview tomorrow.
fields.meaning_sentence: Tôi có một buổi phỏng vấn xin việc vào ngày mai.

fields.definition: Knowledge or skill from doing, seeing, or feeling things
fields.example_sentence: Do you have any experience in sales?
fields.meaning_sentence: Bạn có kinh nghiệm gì trong lĩnh vực bán hàng không?

fields.definition: A person that you work with
fields.example_sentence: She is a colleague of mine.
fields.meaning_sentence: Cô ấy là đồng nghiệp của tôi.

fields.definition: Something that you must have or do
fields.example_sentence: Fluency in English is a requirement for this job.
fields.meaning_sentence: Thành thạo tiếng Anh là một yêu cầu cho công việc này.

fields.definition: An organization that sells goods or services
fields.example_sentence: He works for a software company.
fields.meaning_sentence: Anh ấy làm việc cho một công ty phần mềm.

fields.definition: The fact of someone being paid to work for a company
fields.example_sentence: She is seeking full-time employment.
fields.meaning_sentence: Cô ấy đang tìm kiếm một công việc toàn thời gian.

fields.definition: A time or day by which something must be done
fields.example_sentence: The deadline for the project is Friday.
fields.meaning_sentence: Hạn chót cho dự án là thứ Sáu.

fields.definition: To give up a job or position
fields.example_sentence: He decided to resign from his position.
fields.meaning_sentence: Anh ấy quyết định từ chức.
